  Some parts of this episode are f=
ictional.
  According to Shinsengumi side records, they assassinated Uchiya=
ma
  because he cornered the market of rice then oil to raise the price, in=

  order to lose Shogunate's credit as Uchiyama communicated secretly with
=
  Choshu clan.
  Other side explains differently the reason, saying that as=
sassination
  was caused by the rivality between Shinsengumi and Osaka Bugy=
osyo.
  As it was showed in the drama, Uchiyama pursued the question of
  S=
hinsengumi's responsibility for the killing of Sumo wrestlers.
  So Shinsen=
gumi people killed him considering Uchiyama as obstacle for
  their activit=
y in Osaka.
  But the real reason of the assassination is unknown, and I re=
ad recently
  that the descendants of Uchiyama didn't know until recently t=
hat the
  culprit of the murder of their ancestor was Shinsengumi. They had=

  believed culprit was Choshu ronins.

  S
  P
  O
  I
  L
  E
  R

  I th=
ink the main point of the question is Saito's capture and torture
  part wa=
s completely invention of the scriptwriter.
  The members who executed the =
assassination were, according to Shimozawa
  Kan's book, Kondo, Okita, Hara=
da,Nagakura and Inoue. And Nagakura said
  there were also Hijikata, Shimad=
a, and Yamazaki.
  Anyway Saito's name didn't appear in this affair...

  M=
ay be momoiro san could rectify or add something to what I wrote.
  I' d li=
ke to reply for other posts too but it will take more time.

  Tama

  P.S.=
 I understand that for some people it would be shocking to see Saito
  tied=
 up and beaten like that!
